name: FinMobility ry
goal: FinMobility is actively influencing the making of the EU legislation concerning transport sector, from the preparation phase to the final decision-making, in all the EU institutions. Our object is to bring the Finnish point of view to the EU-level discussion. While we bring the messages of the members of FinMobility into the EUâ€™s decision-making, we also transfer the information from the EU level to our members.
interests: Climate Action, Customs, Digital economy and society, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, Single market, Taxation, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives: FinMobility follows EU legislation procedures especially regarding transport, logistics, mobility, environment and climate, social pillar and sharing economy covering all transport modes and particularly focusing on road transport sector.
